{{DISPLAYTITLE:''Minecraft'' x Fossil}}
{{for|the skeletal feature in Minecraft|Fossil}}
[[File:Fossil Grass Block Collection 1.webp|thumb|Minecraft Fossil merchandise.]]
'''''Minecraft'' x Fossil''' is a collaboration between [[Mojang Studios]] and {{w|Fossil Group|Fossil}}, a fashion design company. The collection was announced and released on March 3, 2025.<ref>https://www.instagram.com/p/DGvSocERQFH/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==</ref> Five products were released as part of the collection. A [[Minecraft x Twitch#Twitch Drops|Twitch WatchTime Quest]] was also put out to celebrate the partnership between March 7 and March 14, 2025.<ref name="twitch">{{Tweet|Minecraft|1898029130479747574|TWITCH WATCH TIME QUEST! - From March 7th at 7:00 am PT until March 14th at 11:59 pm PT. Watch 10 Minutes of Minecraft to unlock an exclusive item.|March 7, 2025}}</ref>
